You can now pay for cheats directly in this game. Just buy a character skin to better blend in the landscape or simply confuse the enemy. CS as a pay2win. 

Let's not forget the russian players speaking only russian (with 150 ms ping). 

And the blatant cheaters. Reporting and getting the "congratulation you helped ban a player" pop up a few days laters is just a miserable experience.
ну как бы типо блин ну блин ну как бы типо почему бы и неееет?
melhor jogo de todos os tempos

I'm honestly impressed with how long valve and all of the players in this community have kept this game alive. It has truly been a journey and a few dreams within the journey. I don't think CS will ever be the "big thing" to play anymore, and the days of youtubers that have never played cs before hoping on trends are over. Still a great game with continual updates, but my 2014-2017 crew, our journey is done here.
